SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
The player class represent a single player globally with also attributes used inside a game such as PlayerBookshelf, TokenAcquired and PersonalGoalCard

    • updatePoints

      public int updatePoints(Map<Integer,Integer> adjacentPointReference) throws RemoteException
      The method used to calculate the total points scored with PersonalGoalCard, CommonGoalCard and the adjacency inside the PlayerBookshelf
      Parameters:
      adjacentPointReference - is the Map that represent for each size of group the relative points
      Returns:
      the total points scored by the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI exception

    • triggerListener

      public void triggerListener(String userToBeUpdated) throws RemoteException
      Method used to trigger the listener when a player joins or re-joins a game after a crash, to receive the complete status of the player
      Parameters:
      userToBeUpdated - the username of the user that needs to receive the updates
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI exception

    • unsubscribeFromListener

      public void unsubscribeFromListener(String username)
      This method removes a player from the list of subscriber to this player's playerListener
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player to be removed

      public Set<PlayerSubscriber> getSubs()
